components.name: The name of the component of this budget line using the [budgetClassificationsComponents](https://github.com/INAImexico/ocds_budgetClasifications_extension/blob/master/codelists/budgetClassificationComponents.csv) codelist.
components.level: The hierarchy level of the component inside a classification.
components.id: ID to identify a specific value of the origin component.
components.description: Descripction of the specific value of the component.

measures.id: ID to identify the specific accruing moment in which the budget's value will be expressed.
